wrwrr, your English is very good, and I fully agree with what you have said!

This is an enhanced CAM. Not a PPVrip. Perhaps you just took IFLIX's so called PPVrip and then enhanced so you got confused as to whether this is a CAM or a PPVrip. This is a CAM. PPVrips have quality almost as high as a DVDrip but with a weird aspect ratio due to recording a pay per view movie on a DVR inside of a hotel. IFLIX used to have proper PPVrips but have been uploading fakes for months now. I also couldn't help but notice that wrwrr has no torrents and thus has lost credibility in his comment. It is the seeders that keep this site running, just because you didn't upload a torrent doesn't mean you don't seed. And it is negative feedback that actually improves something and makes the final product high quality. Please correct future labels of torrents.

Thanks for the effort Hackulus.
